description: Modifies the parameters of a cache parameter group. You can modify up to 20 parameters in a single request by submitting a list parameter name and value pairs.

parameters.name: CacheParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the cache parameter group to modify.

parameters.name: ParameterNameValues
parameters.description: An array of parameter names and values for the parameter update. You must supply at least one parameter name and value; subsequent arguments are optional. A maximum of 20 parameters may be modified per request. (dict) --- Describes a name-value pair that is used to update the value of a parameter. ParameterName (string) --- The name of the parameter. ParameterValue (string) --- The value of the parameter.
